com.ning.billing.osgi.api
Interface OSGIPluginProperties

public interface OSGIPluginProperties

Those represents the properties that plugin can use when registering services and that Killbill knows how to interpret. At a minimum, the plugin should use PLUGIN_NAME_PROP

Field Summary
static String PLUGIN_INSTANCE_PROP
          Name of the instnace of the plugin; if 2 instances of the same plugin register
static String PLUGIN_NAME_PROP
          Name of the plugin when it registers itself
static String PLUGIN_SERVICE_INFO
          Used to export an additional configuration string for that service For instance for Servlet services this is used to specify the path of the servlet.
 

Field Detail

PLUGIN_SERVICE_INFO

static final String PLUGIN_SERVICE_INFO
Used to export an additional configuration string for that service For instance for Servlet services this is used to specify the path of the servlet.
